value:
I wonder if my other platoonmates
are doing all right. Luke, Roderick,
Cecil, Ryan...and Katarina too.

Our platoon was commanded by the
bull of Altea, Lord Cain. He's a man
worthy of admiration.

My grandfather said if I wanted to
truly serve Altea, as he did, there was
one thing I must never do: cook.

I'm royal guard to Prince Marth, even
in an unfamiliar world. It feels natural
for me to be by his side.

Lord Marth is a truly kind man.
Scoundrels may look to take
advantage, but I won't allow it.

I am Kris, royal guard of Altea. Here.
This is for $Nu.

My grandfather always said that true
strength is fighting for others. I'll fight
for this world—and for Prince Marth!

I fight with a purpose. Thoughtless
violence should not be condoned.
...Huh?

Aha! This must mean you have
confidence in me!

I'm Kris, knight of Altea and royal
guard to the hero Prince Marth.
But...just Kris is fine.

What do you think things will
be like five years from now?
Or ten years!$k$pI believe my lord, Prince Marth, will
be king of Altea, and he will rule over
a world at peace...$k$pAnd by then, surely Caeda will have
borne children, and she will be raising
them to be kind and strong...$k$p"True strength is fighting for others."
...I think I may finally understand what
my grandfather meant by that.$k$pJust as I'd give my life for Prince
Marth, now I fight for you. And by
fighting for you, I fight for this world.
たあっ
せえいっ
きゃっ…
This won't stop me...!
I won't let you pass!
Are you prepared?
Dare not underestimate me.
I will not lose.
Prince Marth...
Giggle
I am Kris, royal guard to Prince Marth of Altea. Well met.
Ah! Careful! What if I had been ready to strike?
Wake and go for a run before dawn breaks. It can lift your mood thousand-fold.
When I cook, the food tastes of iron. Where do I go wrong?
To fight someone is to know them. Spar with me!
Whatever harm might befall me, I will safeguard Prince Marth.
I have long wished to be someone who fights to protect another. And now, I fight on your behalf.
Right.
Hmmm...
I'll do my best!
